comments.content:
Oluiso1, please post your future ID requests to the proper section of this board:  
 [http://typophile.com/typeid](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317192817/http:/typophile.com/typeid "http://typophile.com/typeid")

The typeface is Techno Hideo:  
 [http://www.whatfontis.com/Techno-Hideo.font?text=USEFUL%20FIX](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317192817/http:/www.whatfontis.com/Techno-Hideo.font?text=USEFUL%20FIX "http://www.whatfontis.com/Techno-Hideo.font?text=USEFUL%20FIX")
